x-kubernetes-validations.message: builtinLocale is only available when localeProvider is set to `builtin`
icuLocale is only available when localeProvider is set to `icu`
icuRules is only available when localeProvider is set to `icu`

additionalProperties.description:
TypedLocalObjectReference contains enough information to let you locate the
typed referenced object inside the same namespace.

apiGroup.description:
APIGroup is the group for the resource being referenced.
If APIGroup is not specified, the specified Kind must be in the core API group.
For any other third-party types, APIGroup is required.

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced

name.description: Name is the name of resource being referenced

x-kubernetes-validations.message: The number of synchronous replicas should be greater than zero
dataDurability set to 'preferred' requires empty 'standbyNamesPre' and empty 'standbyNamesPost'
imageName and imageCatalogRef are mutually exclusive

additionalProperties.description: InstanceReportedState describes the last reported state of an instance during a reconciliation loop

isPrimary.description: indicates if an instance is the primary one

timeLineID.description: indicates on which TimelineId the instance is

additionalProperties.description: PasswordState represents the state of the password of a managed RoleConfiguration

resourceVersion.description: the resource version of the password secret

transactionID.description: the last transaction ID to affect the role definition in PostgreSQL

additionalProperties.description: PodTopologyLabels represent the topology of a Pod. map[labelName]labelValue
